”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: This podcast is backed by a Facebook Group called Positively Midwest as well. We wanted to help spread being positive. We post daily and share as a group. Whether it's a song, video, book you've read or just sharing how you stay positive. We use the podcast to help spread the word and interview guest that have some amazing stories and how they now stay positive. Steve and Kathryn have bi-weekly episodes talking anything from marriage to kids. Steve interviews guests biweekly so you will have a fresh episode every week! We want to learn and engage together. We hope the podcast helps!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
